scripts.cap:sync: npm run build:web && npm run mobile:sync
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev --workspace backend" "npm run dev --workspace frontend -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5173 --strictPort"
scripts.dev:stop: sh -c 'ps -ef | grep -E "web-codex/.*/(nodemon|vite)|web-codex/backend/server.js" | grep -v grep | awk "{print \$2}" | xargs -r kill'
scripts.dev:termux: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace backend" "npm run dev --workspace frontend -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5173 --strictPort" "npm run dev --workspace partner-portal -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5174 --strictPort"
